definition: abbr. for 北京工人體育場|北京工人体育场[Bei3 jing1 Gong1 ren2 Ti3 yu4 chang3], Workers Stadium

sentences.english: Drew: I would love to go.
sentences.chinese: 你想和我去工體看球嗎？

sentences.english: Located opposite the Workers' Stadium, between Dongzhimen and Gongtibei Road.
sentences.chinese: 位於工人體育館的對面，在東直們和工體北路之間。

sentences.english: Body Works is located in Sanlitun near the residence of the international players.
sentences.chinese: 位於工體三里屯附近，國際大腕府邸。

sentences.english: My joy is in your freedom, not your compliance.
sentences.chinese: 我的工體現在你的自由而非你的順從中。

sentences.english: Gongti Beilu , Sanlitun, Opposite to the North gate of Beijing Workers' Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 工體北路17號，三里屯，工人體育場北門正對面。
